# Resource

A Resource is a specific source of cached datas that is provided from an external url.

By default, a resource provide a single content of data but you can handle multiple by using custom resource

# Default resource

A default resource is exposed with a nuxtJS server middleware and a nuxtJS plugin.

The name attribute is used as a uniq id to identify it from other resources. It's also used to generate the stored filename and the static url that is exposed publicly.

For instance the name with value my-resource will generate:

  • The id my-resource to use it with the nuxtJS plugin
  • A file named my-resource.json inside the default rootFolder
  • An exposed route available at http://hostname:port/rootUrl/my-resource.json
